title: Trott and Afghanistan to part ways after 2026 T20 World Cup
byline: Former England batter Jonathan Trott will leave his job as head coach of Afghanistan after next year’s men’s T20 World Cup.

title: FIFA dismisses Malaysia appeals in forgery scandal
byline: FIFA on Monday announced it had dismissed the appeals lodged by Malaysia’s football federation (FAM) and its seven players in the on-going eligibility scandal linked to forged documents used for an Asia Cup qualifier.

title: Key records broken by champions India in CWC25 final
byline: India’s first-ever ICC Women’s Cricket World Cup triumph saw several records tumble in a clinical display against South Africa.

title: India announces $5.75 million reward for women cricket World Cup winners
byline: India’s cricket board on Monday announced a cash reward of $5.75 million for the women’s team after their triumphant World Cup campaign.
